query:
UPDATE item_chat
        SET 
            seller_unread_count = CASE
                WHEN buyer_id = $1 THEN 0
                ELSE seller_unread_count
            END,
            buyer_unread_count = CASE
                WHEN buyer_id != $2 THEN 0
                ELSE buyer_unread_count
            END
        WHERE id = $3;
